title: Introduction to Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of programming with this beginner-friendly course. Master the basics of coding and problem-solving.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
details: Become a full-stack web developer in just 12 weeks. Cover HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web frameworks.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
details: Unlock the secrets of digital marketing. Learn SEO, social media marketing, and online advertising strategies.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
details: Dive into data analysis and machine learning. Gain hands-on experience with Python and data visualization.

title: Graphic Design Essentials
details: Create stunning visuals and graphics. Explore design principles, typography, and Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Business Strategy and Management
details: Develop strategic thinking skills and lead with confidence. Understand business models and management techniques.

title: Photography Basics
details: Capture beautiful moments with your camera. Learn photography techniques, composition, and editing.

title: Creative Writing Workshop
details: Unleash your writing potential. Explore various writing styles and techniques with expert guidance.

title: Mobile App Development
details: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android. Get hands-on experience with app development and deployment.
